dt-option.name: searchPanes.i18n.showMessage
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the Show button

type.description:
Setting the `-init searchPanes.i18n.showMessage` option to a string of your choice allows the Show All button to have custom text within it.
This property is passed through an `-api i18n()` function.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.i18n.showMessage` parameter is `"Show All"`.
dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchPanes.i18n.showMessage`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchPanes regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchPanes`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchPanes.i18n.showMessage` for full details of this option.

example.title: Change message for the Show button
